short_summary: Establish a contract for the procurement, fabrication and delivery of 600 solid oak interior flag poles.
description: This Request for Proposal (RFP) aims to establish a contract for the purchase, production, and delivery of 600 solid-oak interior flagpoles with a single-piece brass coupler and four screws for Travaux publics et Services gouvernementaux Canada (TPSGC). The requirement is located in the National Capital Region (NCR).
